title: Tawpna nia ka hringnun hi a ral hunin
lyrics:
Tawpna nia ka hringnun hi a ral hunin,
Thihna tuifawn thim ka dai kai ang;
Ralmuanna van ka thlenin lungngaih a bo vang,
Ka thlarau chatuanin a chawl ang.

Van kawtthler mawiah khian,
Angel lai lennaah,
Lei hringnun piah lamah,
Chatuanin ka la han chawl ang.

Lawmna sawi sen loh chu khawpuiah chuan a awm,
Hmangaihna thlifim a tleh fo va;
Tui nung lui chatuanin a luang cham del chutah,
Lungkham, buai leh tahna piah ramah.

Tuipui thim ral rama van kawtthler han thlen chu,
Engtia lawmna nasa ni ang maw!
Chatuanin chu ramah van angel rualte nen,
Hnehna hla mawi kan sa rual ang a.
